thread.title: Top location, good service, close to the top attractions, friendly room maids
thread.title_full: Top location, good service, close to the top attractions, friendly room maids - Review of W New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Peter H
title: Top location, good service, close to the top attractions, friendly room maids
text: First time in NYC and very happy with the place. Left the hotel for a walk around on arrival, after a very long flight. First sight of the Chrysler Building and Grand Central Terminal (only a few minutes walk south along Lexington Ave) was wonderful. Helpful staff. I would certainly return
